TopicTitle: Would anyone donate a Goto telescope?

Articles.Content:
Hello there,

I am looking everywhere for a goto telescope, and unfortunately I am not having much luck getting one. So I am asking the KSP community if anyone would donate their goto telescope. There are a few names for goto telescopes like computerised telescope and tracking telescope. If you have one and willing to donate please feel free to comment. Just a few problems though. I can pick it up but **only from places in England.** If you live in Wales or Scotland you may have to post it and unfortunately this is quite a lot of money.

Please post if you will be happy to give one away.

Thank you in advance.

Boyercam ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
